name: care-portal
description: A Medical Store/Billing Software for Any Health Care Center or Hospital.
author: Soief Ali <soiefmail@gmail.com>

scripts.start: sudo -S brew services start mongodb && forever cleanlogs && forever start -o out.log -e err.log ./bin/www && sleep 1 && open http://localhost:3000
scripts.stop: sudo -S brew services stop mongodb && forever stop ./bin/www
